channel.title: Niño Bien on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Niño Bien on Simba Tango

item.title: La Cumparsita
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: by Simba tango Niño Bien has always been one of my favorite milongas, and when I found the picture I used for illustration of my post on organizing a milonga, I was reminded that, unlike the photographer, I have never been there early, before the milonga really starts. For some reason, we always arrive late.. …and possibly stay late. Although not often so late as to hear the dj put on La Cumparsita, the tango often used to round off the night at Buenos Aires milongas.

item.title: Tango magazines -- preparing for Buenos Aires
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: Some of our students are going to Buenos Aires tomorrow. Oh the memories… I made sure they were equipped with the latest editions of El tangauta and B.A. Tango, giving a good overview over the happenings in November and December. They were always hard to get, even if they are given away for free, it could easily take a couple of weeks before we got hold of an issue. Now, they are available online, and one can prepare for the first week at home or on the plane down there.
